authentication.title: User Registration
authentication.story: As a new user, I want to create an account so that I can access the platform.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter email and password
Password must be 8+ chars with 1 uppercase, 1 number
User redirected to onboarding after email verification

authentication.title: User Login
authentication.story: As a registered user, I want to log in so that I can access my account.

authentication.title: OAuth Social Login
authentication.story: As a user, I want to log in with Google/GitHub so that registration is faster.
acceptance_criteria: New account created if first login
Existing account linked if email matches

authentication.title: Password Reset
authentication.story: As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access if I forget it.
acceptance_criteria: New password must differ from previous 3

e-commerce.title: Product Listing
e-commerce.story: As a shopper, I want to browse products so that I can find items to purchase.
acceptance_criteria: Each product shows image, name, price, rating
Filter by category, price range, rating

e-commerce.title: Shopping Cart
e-commerce.story: As a shopper, I want to add items to a cart so that I can purchase multiple items.
acceptance_criteria: Add to cart button on product page
Cart icon shows item count in header

e-commerce.title: Checkout Flow
e-commerce.story: As a shopper, I want to complete a purchase so that I receive my items.

dashboard.title: Analytics Overview
dashboard.story: As an admin, I want to see key metrics so that I can monitor business health.
acceptance_criteria: KPI cards: revenue, users, orders, conversion rate

dashboard.title: User Management
dashboard.story: As an admin, I want to manage users so that I can control access.

priority_framework.must-have: Core functionality, app doesn't work without it (MVP)
priority_framework.should-have: Important but not critical, can launch without
priority_framework.could-have: Nice to have, improves UX but not essential
priority_framework.wont-have: Future scope, explicitly excluded from this release
